Name: Apple & Custard Cocktail
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Smooth and creamy, this tastes like its name.
History: Created by yours truly in 2002 after rediscovering advocaat on a trip to Amsterdam.
Nutrition: One serving of Apple & Custard Cocktail contains 329 calories
